The [93mintra[0m- and [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mproducts[0m of [93mDOPC[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m was [93msignificantly[0m [93mdiminished[0m in the [93mvesicles[0m, [93mhowever[0m, the [93mequilibrium[0m [93mstate[0m in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mreached[0m in [93mmuch[0m [93mless[0m [93mtime[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93msolution[0m ([93m1[0m [93mh[0m in [93mvesicles[0m [93mvs[0m. [93m24[0m [93mh[0m in [93msolution[0m). - [93mInorganic[0m [93mclick[0m [93mreactions[0m: [93mrecent[0m [93mstudies[0m on the [93mreactivity[0m of [93mmetal[0m [93mazides[0m of [93mgroups[0m [93m6[0m-[93m9[0m [93mtowards[0m [93malkynes[0m and [93mnitriles[0m.: [93mClick[0m [93mreactions[0m [93mhave[0m been [93mcomprehensively[0m [95mexplored[0m and [93memployed[0m in [93mbio[0m-[93morthogonal[0m [93mcoupling[0m [93mowing[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mremarkable[0m [93mspecificity[0m. - [93mEnantioselective[0m [93mcopper[0m-[93mcatalysed[0m [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m with [93malkenes[0m and [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m.: [93mDespite[0m [93mimpressive[0m [93madvances[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m, the [93mcorresponding[0m [93masymmetric[0m [93mcounterpart[0m [93mhas[0m [93mremained[0m a [93mformidable[0m [93mchallenge[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpresent[0m the [93mfirst[0m [93mexample[0m of [93masymmetric[0m [93mdefluorinative[0m [93malkylation[0m of [93mpolyfluoroarenes[0m with [93mreadily[0m [93maccessible[0m [93malkenes[0m, [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m, and even ( [93mZ[0m / [93mE[0m )-[93mmixed[0m [93m1[0m,[93m3[0m-[93mdienes[0m as [93mpotential[0m [93mnucleophiles[0m in the [93mpresence[0m of a [93mchiral[0m [93mCuH[0m [93mcatalyst[0m, [93mavoiding[0m the [93mconventional[0m [93mutilization[0m of [93mhighly[0m [93mreactive[0m [93morganometallics[0m.
